testcase.classname: Redeem SCB points cashback to CASA
testcase.name: Successfully redeem SCB points cashback to CASA
testcase.system-out: Given ETB SCB customer "001400000000000022345678989011" with CASA "085-3-67085-3" has loyalty points "5000" AND eligibility "Y" according to the campaign "electric bill","5321" that marketer condition set up "0.05".passed When customer make the bill payment transaction "1186KX18100b11","Y","bill payment","2000","2018-04-10T23:17:18+00:00" equal to redeem cashback "2000" from CASA.passed Then customer successfully make the bill payment transaction of CASA........passed And will be deducted points for cashback redemption.........................passed And receive cashback "100" to "085-3-67085-3"...............................passed

testcase.classname: Redeem SCB points cashback to CASA
testcase.name: Unsuccessfully redeem SCB points cashback to CASA due to insufficient points
